libshapedraw.shape
Class WireframeLinesBlendIterable

java.lang.Object
  libshapedraw.shape.Shape
      libshapedraw.shape.WireframeShape
          libshapedraw.shape.WireframeLines
              libshapedraw.shape.WireframeLinesBlendIterable
All Implemented Interfaces:
XrayShape
Direct Known Subclasses:
WireframeLinesBlend
public class WireframeLinesBlendIterable
extends WireframeLines

A series of connected line segments that smoothly blends from one line style to another along the segments.

For most use cases you'll want to use WireframeLinesBlend instead, which takes a Collection of ReadonlyVector3s rather than an Iterable. Only use this class if you want to blend based solely on the render cap, not on the number of points.

renderLines

protected void renderLines(MinecraftAccess mc,

Description copied from class: WireframeShape
Using the MinecraftAccess param, interact with the Tessellator to draw vertices. The line depth function/width/color has already been set up.
